# EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM SETTING

Save custom camera settings for commonly-encountered situations. Saved settings can be recalled by rotating the mode dial to positions C1 (CUSTOM 1) through C4 (CUSTOM 4) (ðŸ“– 82).

## AUTO UPDATE CUSTOM SETTING

Choose whether changes to saved custom settings apply automatically.

| Option  | Description                                                                 |
|---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ENABLE  | Changes to custom settings banks CUSTOM 1 through CUSTOM 4 apply automatically. |
| DISABLE | Changes do not apply automatically. Any changes to custom settings must be applied manually (ðŸ“– 84). |

## CUSTOM MODE SETTING

Choose whether the current custom settings bank is to be used for still photography or movie recording (ðŸ“– 82).
